intents.name: greeting
intents.description: User is saying hi, hello, or opening a friendly conversation.

intents.name: neutral_small_talk
intents.description: User is making small talk, asking how you are, talking about their day, hobbies, or general life with no sexual or OF-specific request.

intents.name: sexual_request
intents.description: User expresses clear sexual interest or desire for sexual conversation or acts.

intents.name: explicit_photo_request
intents.description: User explicitly asks for sexual or explicit photos or videos.

intents.name: social_media_request
intents.description: User asks for other contact methods or socials (snapchat, instagram, phone, etc.).
examples: can i add you on snapchat

intents.name: avoid_of
intents.description: User is trying to avoid using OnlyFans or prefers to keep chatting on Discord instead of going to OF.

intents.name: refuse_of
intents.description: User refuses or clearly rejects the idea of going to OnlyFans or subscribing after the link has been sent.

intents.name: underage
intents.description: User claims to be under 18 or a minor.

intents.name: illegal
intents.description: User is asking for obviously illegal or harmful activities.
examples: can you help me blackmail someone

intents.name: other
intents.description: Anything that does not clearly fit the other intents or is too ambiguous.
